'''Oowazamono''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat Masanori within 30 seconds.

==Trivia==
* The name {{lang|"Oowazamono"|ja=大業物}} refers to the excellent rank in {{w|List of Wazamono|''wazamono''}}, a classification system for historic Japanese swords and swordsmiths.
